Module JTrashFX
Package application.model.player

Class User

java.lang.Object
application.model.player.Player
application.model.player.User
public class User extends Player
Class to represent an user (Human Player) who extends player
Author:
Luigi Pennisi

  • Constructor Details

    • User

      private User(String nick, String pass, int vinte, int perse, float livello, String avatar)
      Create a new User from the parameter given, this constructor is used for the sign up
      Parameters:
      nick - The nick of the user
      pass - The password
      vinte - Number of games won
      perse - Number of games lost
      livello - Level of the player
      avatar - The path for the profile image

    • User

      private User(User u)
      Create a new User from an already existing User, this constructor is used for the log in
      Parameters:
      u - User got from the gson reader

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static User getInstance()
      getter of the instance, the instance will not be created if null, to work the user has to be initialized through the login method. This method is just a simple instance getter
      Returns:
      the static instance of User

    • endGame

      public void endGame(boolean win)
      This method update the player statistics based on the status of the current game and save them
      Parameters:
      win - is a boolean used to know if the player won or lost the game

    • encrypt

      private static String encrypt(String pass)
      This Method encrypt the password with hash(md5) encryption
      Parameters:
      pass - is the pass to encrypt
      Returns:
      the encrypted password or null if there has been an error

    • save

      public boolean save()
      This method save the player's statistics in his Json file using the gson library
      Returns:
      true if it saved, false if it didn't

    • delete

      public boolean delete()
      This method needs to delete an account so the file from the folder
      Returns:
      true if works, false if it encounter an error

    • signup

      public static boolean signup(String nick, String pass)
      This method is used to sign up a new account
      Parameters:
      nick - is the user's name choose to sign with
      pass - is the password choose to protect the account
      Returns:
      true if works, false if it encounter an error

    • login

      public static User login(String nick, String pass)
      This method is used to permit the user to log in his account
      Parameters:
      nick - is the name of the account in which log in
      pass - is the password to access to the account
      Returns:
      the User instance if he logged in, Null if it encounter an error
